tool_description: Roll multiple dice for your table top application!
name: Dice Roll
title: Dice Roll

api_list.name: Roll
api_list.description:
The API usage is simple, submit an array of strings in the format of `NdD+M` where N is the number of dice that you want to throw, D is the type of dice that you want to throw, and M is the base modifier that you want to apply (the +M is optional). Some examples can be:
- 1d4+5
- 6d6
- 10d8+1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dice-roll2.p.rapidapi.com/roll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dice-roll2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dice-roll2.p.rapidapi.com/roll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dice-roll2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
